text.language: <ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ]paryenoc n~atywleb: pikumillion etcwtp: n~te ]oikoumen/ t/rc.
Hail to you, O full of grace, / the undefiled virgin, / the chosen vessel / for all the world.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -218.33px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important;

text.language: Hail to you, O full of grace, / the undefiled virgin, / the chosen vessel / for all the world.
السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة العذراء غير الدنسة الإناء المختار لكل المسكونة.
Pilampac n~at[eno: p~sousou n~te ]paryenia: piervei n~atbwl e~bol: ouoh pis~bwt n~te pinah].
The ever-burning lamp, / the pride of virginity, / the indestructible sanctuary, / and the scepter of faith.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -127.34px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Pelita yang tak padam, kebanggaan perawan, mezbah tak terhancurkan,

text.language: المصباح غير المُطفأ فخر البتولية الهيكل غير المُنقض وقضيب الإيمان.
Ma]ho m~v/etaremacf: Penc#w#r# n~a~gayoc: n~tefw~li n~naiqici e~bolharon: n~tefcemni nan n~tefhir/n/.
Ask our good Savior / whom you gave birth to, / to deliver us from these hardships / and settle His peace upon us.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: -11.34px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Mintalah pada Dia yang kau lahirkan, Juruselamat yang baik,
angkat kesukaran kami, dan brikan kami damai-Nya.

text.language: اسألى الذى ولدته مخلصنا الصالح أن يرفع عنا هذه الأتعاب ويقرر لنا سلامه.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ]lu,nia n~kayaroc: y/e~tacfai qa pilampac: pi,~rwm n~te ]meynou].
Hail to you O full of grace, / the pure lampstand / which carries the lamp, / the fire of divinity.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 104.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important;

text.language: السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة المنارة النقية حاملة المصباح نار اللاهوت.
<ere ]helpic n~oujai: n~te ]oikoumen/ t/rc: eyb/] gar anerremhe: e~bolha picahoui n~te Eua.
Hail to you, the hope / of salvation of the world. / Because of you, we were / liberated from Eve's curse.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 195.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Bersukalah hai harapan keselamatan, tuk semua ciptaan,

text.language: السلام لك يارجاء خلاص كل المسكونة لأننا من أجلك عُتقنا من لعنة حواء.
Eyb/] on anerman~swpi: m~Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: vai e~tafi~ e~h~r/i e~jw: afera~gia~zin m~mo.
Also, because of you, / we became the dwelling / of the Holy Spirit / who came on you and sanctified you.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 311.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: bait Roh Kudus, yang turun ke atasmu, dan menguduskanmu.

text.language: ومن أجلك أيضاً صرنا مسكناً للروح القدس الذى حل عليكِ وقدسك.
<ere y/e~ta Gabri/l: er,eretizin m~moc: je ,ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
Hail to whom Gabriel / greeted saying: / Hail to you O full of grace; / the Lord is with you.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 402.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Salam bagi dia, yang disambut Gabriel berkata, “Salam bagimu hai penuh karunia, Tuhan besertamu.”

text.language: السلام للتى أقرأها غبريال السلام قائلا السلام لك ياممتلئة نعمة الرب معكِ.
Ap~]ma] gar m~V~iwt: swpi qen pejinerboki: a~t~paroucia m~Pis/ri: swpi n~h~r/i qen tem/tra.
For the Father’s pleasure / was in your pregnancy / and the appearance of the Son / was in your womb.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 493.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

text.language: لأن مسرة الآب كانت فى حبلك وظهور الإبن كان فى أحشائك.
APip#n#a# e#y#u#: moh m~mai niben n~te: te'u,/ nem pecwma: w~ Maria y~mau m~V].
The Holy Spirit / filled every part of you, / your soul and your body, / O Mary the Mother of God.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 609.658px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: Roh Kudus, penuhi stiap bagian dirimu, jiwa dan tubuhmu, ya Maria Bunda Allah.

text.language: والروح القدس ملأ كل موضع منكِ نفسك وجسدك يامريم أم الله.
Eybe vai tenersai hwn: qen ousai m~p#n#a#tikon: ouoh m~p~rov/tikon eucop: enws e~bol nem p~ouro Dauid.
For this, we also / celebrate a spiritual / and prophetic feast, / proclaiming with King David.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 700.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: perayaan rohani maupun perayaan nubuat, yang dinyatakan bersama Raja Daud.

text.language: لأجل هذا نعيد نحن أيضاً عيداً روحياً ونبوياً معاً صارخين مع الملك داود.
Je twnk Po#c# e~pekm~ton: n~yok nem ]kibwtoc: n~te pima e#y#u# n~tak: e~te n~yo te w~ Maria.
Saying: Arise, O Lord, into your rest, / You, and the ark / of Your holy place / which is you O Mary.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 816.658px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

text.language: قائلين قم يارب إلى راحتك أنتَ وتابوت قدسك الذى هو أنتِ يامريم.
<ere y/eymeh n~h~mot: ]paryenoc n~atywleb: ]c~k/n/ n~aymounk n~jij: pia~ho n~te ]meym/i.
Hail to you O full of grace, / the undefiled virgin / the dome not made with hands, / the treasure of righteousness.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1054.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Perawan tak bernoda, tabernakel yang tak dibuat oleh tangan, harta kebenaran.

text.language: السلام للممتلئة نعمة العذراء غير الدنسة القبة غير المصنوعة بالأيدى كنز البر.
<ere ][rompi eynecwc: y/e~tachisennoufi nan: n~]hir/n/ n~te V]: y/e~tacswpi sa nirwmi.
Hail to the beautiful dove / who announced to us / the peace of God / which has been given to men.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 45.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1170.69px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 91px !important;

language.div: yang nyatakan pada kami,damai sejahtera Allah, bagi manusia.

text.language: السلام للحمامة الحسنة التى بشرتنا بسلام الله الذى صار للبشر.
<ere y~mau m~v/etaferrwmi: qen pefouws m~min m~mof: nem p~]ma] m~Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#.
Hail to the mother of the Incarnate / by His own will, / and the pleasure of His Father / and the Holy Spirit.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1261.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Salam bagi Bunda dari yang Berinkarnasi, atas kehendak-Nya sendiri, dan kesenangan Bapa-Nya,

text.language: السلام لأم المتأنس بإرادته وحده ومسرة أبيه والروح القدس.
<ere pic~tamnoc n~noub: e~re pimanna h/p n~q/tf: nem pis~bwt n~se m~peukinwn: e~ta Mwuc~/c mes ]petra n~q/tf.
Hail to the golden vessel / wherein the manna was hidden / and the rod of almond wood / which Moses used to strike the rock.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1377.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: tempat Manna sembunyi, dan tongkat kayu badam, yang Musa gunakan tuk pukul batu.

text.language: السلام للقسط الذهبى المخفى فيه المن وعصا الخشب اللوزى التى ضرب بها موسى الصخرة.
<ere ke,aritwmen/: w~ ]t~rapeza m~p#n#a#tik/: et] m~p~wnq n~ouon niben: eynaouwm e~bol n~q/tc.
Hail to you O full of grace, / the spiritual table, / which gives life to everyone / who eats from it.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1493.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: hai meja rohani, yang memberi hidup buat semua orang, yang makan darinya.

text.language: السلام للممتلئة نعمة المائدة الروحية التى تعطى الحياة لكل من يأكل منها.
<ere pikumillion: n~avyarton n~te ]meynou]: e~tervaqri n~ouon niben: eynacw e~bol n~q/tf.
Hail to the incorrupt vessel / which is for the divinity, / which cures all / who drink from it.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1609.67px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Salam bagimu hai bejana yang tak rusak, dari keilahian itu, yang sembuhkan tiap orang, yang minum dari bejana itu.

text.language: السلام للإناء غير الفاسد الذى للاهوت المعطى الشفاء لكل من يشرب منه.
Ainaerh/tc qen ou[isswou: n~takim m~p~organon m~palac: n~tajw m~p~taio n~te taiparyenoc: nem neccuggwmion eucop.
I begin eagerly to move / the organ of my tongue / and speak of the honor of this virgin / and her praise.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 141px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 70.5px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1725.69px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 141px !important;

text.language: أبدأ باشتياق محركاً أرغن لسانى وأتحدث بكرامة هذه العذراء ومدائحها معاً.
Je n~yoc gar pe pensousou: nem tenhelpic nem pentajro: qen t~paroucia m~Pennou]: Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#.
For she is our pride, / our hope, and our affirmation / in the appearance of our Lord / and God Jesus Christ.

qb-div.style: width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important; transform: none !important; transform-origin: 154px 58px !important; zoom: 1 !important; margin-top: 1866.69px !important; margin-left: 317px !important;
top: 0px !important; left: 0px !important; width: 308px !important; height: 116px !important;

language.div: Dialah kebanggaan kami,harapan dan peneguhan, pada kedatangan [Kedua] Allah kami, Tuhan kami Yesus Kristus.

text.language: لأنها فخرنا ورجاؤنا وثباتنا فى ظهور إلهنا ربنا يسوع المسيح.
